1.content:
Thursday afternoon. Farrah would be here until Sunday night, babysitting these four children. Maddy, the oldest, Savannah, the weird one, Emma, the excitable one, and Sam, the youngest. The girls were 13, 11, 12, and 9, respectively. Farrah was wearing a black t-shirt and skirt, and no socks.

Sam: Farrah, I’m bored!

Farrah: *sigh* alright, what am I supposed to do about that?

Sam: I wanna playyyy!

Farrah: well, what do you wanna play, then!
1.title: Chapter One

choices: Tied Farah up spread eagle on the floor
Took Farrah to their parents room and tied her up on the bed
Forced her to do whatever they said
12.content:
Maddy pulled Farrah’s shirt off, revealing a sexy midsection and *gasp* no bra!

Sam: look, her boobies are showing!

Maddy ran away, giggling. Farrah tried to chase her, but the other girls tackled her and pinned her down, pulling her skirt and panties off too.

Savannah: ehehe, Farrah’s naked!

Hiding Farrah’s clothes, the four girls then...

122.content:
They tied her to the bed hogtied, so that her ass was accentuated and her cheeks were spread.

“H-hey, lemme go!” She pleaded, but Maddy got out a stiff feather and started tickling Farrah’s ticklish asshole.

“N-NOHOHOHOAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOT THEHEHEHEREAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!”
122.title: Tickle!

info.brief_description: Tales of a babysitter and four devious little girls!
info.description: 18-year-old Sawyer is stuck babysitting four little girls: Sam, Assiah, Farrah, and Savannah. But when the subject of tickling is innocently brought up, these kids find a weakness of their sitter that theyâre all too eager to exploit!
